content.body: it seems weird to me that SetTypedArrayFromArrayLike allows targetOffset to be a non-neg int, or ∞, but then it throws a RangeError if it's ∞ in step 11. why not throw that sooner, or disallow it entirely?
i'd guess because that's just how it was copy/pasted during refactoring
i can see an argument for helper AOs having tighter, already-checked types
